articles.author: Washington Examiner
articles.title: Trump fully pardons Rod Blagojevich
articles.description: "He was set up by a lot of bad people," the president said.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump signed a full pardon for former Democratic Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich on Monday after commuting his sentence back in 2020.
Blagojevich developed a relationship with Trump when he appeared as a contestant on the ninth season ... [1634 chars]

articles.author: ElliotLakeToday.com
articles.title: Top Justice Department official orders prosecutors to drop charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — A top official at the U.S. Department of Justice has ordered federal prosecutors to drop charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams, a Democrat who has cultivated a warm relationship with President Donald Trump.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) — A top official at the U.S. Department of Justice has ordered federal prosecutors to drop charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams, a Democrat who has cultivated a warm relationship with President Donald Trump.
In a two-page memo obta... [1378 chars]

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Increasing numbers of Democrats want their party to oppose Trump - CBS News poll analysis
articles.description: Democrats express mixed confidence in Democratic congressional leaders' ability to oppose Trump.
articles.content:
As often happens early in a presidential term, much of the focus has been on the new Trump administration, which started with net positive reviews — but how do Americans think the parties in Congress should be reacting?
The nation's rank-and-file Dem... [1913 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Tariff Tango: A New Chapter in Trade Wars
articles.description: President Trump plans to impose reciprocal tariffs on various countries, emphasizing his stance on fair trade. He aims to increase duties to 25% on steel and aluminum, with further tariffs on cars, semiconductor chips, and pharmaceuticals. Trump dismisses concerns over potential retaliation by other nations.
articles.content: President Donald Trump announced plans to impose reciprocal tariffs on other countries within two days, reinforcing his trade policy stance. The announcement came during a signing ceremony in the Oval Office, where Trump ended all exclusions to steel... [505 chars]

articles.author: Yahoo Finance
articles.title: New 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum to start March 4 as Trump reworks the US trade landscape
articles.description: Donald Trump's rapid reorientation of the US trade landscape continued apace on Monday as he signed an executive order to impose 25% duties on steel and aluminum regardless of the source country. They kick in March 4.
articles.content:
Donald Trump's rapid reorientation of the US trade landscape continued apace on Monday as he signed an executive order to impose 25% duties on steel and aluminum regardless of the source country.
The tariffs are set to kick in on March 4, according t... [6505 chars]
